name: OuroboRoll
description:
To play the game, visit the project URL:
https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/249393992/

Instructions

  • Click the play button in the center to begin.
  • Get points by collecting flowers while making sure not to drown in the water or get in the way of attacking snakes.
  • Down arrow makes you flatten out. You must be flattened out when over water to survive.
  • Spacebar makes you jump. If you are flattened, spacebar will make you roll again. You must be rolling when attacked by a snake.

Notes and Credits

  • All art created in Scratch (aside from one asset, the JimJam logo from Tim Ruswick)
  • Some ideas from family members (catching flowers, sliding over water)
  • Original Music (MIDI file composed using Org Maker and rendered to audio using Windows Media Player)
